description._content: Catalog #: 09_02048 Title: Brigadier General Clarence S. ""Bill"" Irvine Special Collection Photo Additional Information: Clarence S. Irvine (on left) with man identified as 'Gregary' standing in front of a Consolidated PB-2A (P-30) aircraft. Handwritten inscription ""Gregary & I & the PB-2A high altitude fighter I used for casual flying between bases of operation"", Brigadier General Clarence Irvine enjoyed a long distinguished military career, mainly involving engineering. He served with the XXI Bomber Command (B-29's) during WWII and continued to serve throughout the 1950s and 1960s. Corporation Name: Consolidated Aircraft Tags: Brigadier General Clarence S. ""Bill"" Irvine Special Collection Photo,Â Consolidated Aircraft Repository: San Diego Air and Space Museum Archive
